recipesJson.name: Sugar Cookies N' Cream
recipesJson.author: C6-R
recipesJson.description: Another cookies N cream. This is pretty good right off the rip, but benefits from a week steep like most recipes with cream. Tried at first with CAP GCV1 but it wasnt that great, you think V1 would be better but , with this recipe its alot better with V2. If you dont have V2, V1 will work but, doesnt carry what it needs from V1. Hope yall enjoy!
